body:
Wonder trading eevee's 

It's about 10:45 pm east cost time and I'm trading a bunch of (mostly lvl 1 lol) eevees over wonder trade.  Soooooo if anyone wants some for evolving or whatever connect to wonder trade and see if we cross paths!  I'm hoping to get a ditto from a region other than USA for shiny breeding. So if you happen to have one send that over! 

                                                                                                      -Azure

P.S I'm not under the name AzureKitty (as far as ik) But my name starts with J there's your hint :p

title: Any Pokemon X or Y players?

replies.body: Why would I need a eevee when I have a lvl 100 flareon + my shiny mew, relicanth, clauncher, basculin, and Gyrados? I'm also giving away 1 free shiny (Relicanth or Basculin) msg me on Skype for friend code
